messages.title: Real change for Britain
messages.content: Nick Clegg's Liberal Democrats are fighting for real change for Britain. Labour have let us down and the Conservatives will not deliver the real changes Britain needs now. Only the Liberal Democrats have plans to bring real change to the way Britain is run, to improve your health service and make taxes fairer. Across Britain it is the Liberal Democrats who are standing up for local people. This election will be a close one and you can make the difference.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems want to scrap ID cards and spend the money to put more police on our streets instead.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can't win here! Voting Labour or staying at home will just mean a Conservative MP for our area.

issues.environment: Environment should be the top priority for our local MP.
issues.health: The Lib Dems will bring real change to the way Britain is run to improve your health service.
issues.immigration: Immigration should be the top priority for our local MP.
issues.labourEmployment: Economy and Jobs should be the top priority for our local MP.
issues.lawCrime: The Lib Dems want to scrap ID cards and spend the money to put more police on our streets instead.
issues.transport: Transport should be the top priority for our local MP. Do you have a problem with your local roads? Do you travel by bus or train regularly? How do you rate public transport locally?

community.content: If you could improve one thing about our area, what would it be? I’ve worked hard for our area for 10 years, but there is still much we need to do here. I want to know your priorities so I can continue standing up for you on the issues that matter.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've worked hard for our area for 10 years, but there is still much we need to do here. I want to know your priorities so I can continue standing up for you on the issues that matter.

contactInformation.address: Sandra Gidley's Residents’ Survey, FREEPOST, 3a Victoria Place, Love Lane, Romsey, SO51 8DE

examples: Labour have let us down and the Conservatives will not deliver the real changes Britain needs now.
I’ve worked hard for our area for 10 years, but there is still much we need to do here.
If you could improve one thing about our area, what would it be?
More than ever local people need a strong voice to speak out for them.
I'm fighting to put more police on the beat, protect local health services and cut taxes for ordinary local people.
Have you experienced any problems registering for NHS services recently?
Labour have let us down and the Conservatives will not deliver the real changes Britain needs now.
